segments.text: Hi . Today , I am the interviewer for your visa application .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Here is my application form and all the documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me why do you want a visa to America ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I want to have a view of the exotic landscapes to extend my views and understanding of the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do you plan to go to America all by yourself or with your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you finished all you preparation ?
segments.speaker: S1
